name: makrx-ecosystem
description: MakrX - The Modular OS of Making

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:makrcave" "npm run dev:store"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:frontends
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w packages/ui -w packages/types -w packages/utils
scripts.build:frontends: npm run build -w frontend/gateway-frontend -w frontend/makrcave-frontend -w frontend/makrx-store-frontend

author: MakrX Team
